Pixels.summary: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.
credits: Director: Chris Columbus
Writers: Tim Herlihy (screenplay), Timothy Dowling (screenplay)
Stars: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan

Tom and Jerry: The Movie.summary: Tom and Jerry must save a girl from her evil aunt.
credits: Director: Phil Roman
Writer: Dennis Marks (screenplay)
Stars: Richard Kind, Dana Hill, Anndi McAfee

The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air.summary: A streetwise, poor young man from Philadelphia is sent by his mother to live with his aunt, uncle and cousins in their Bel-Air mansion.
credits: Creators: Andy Borowitz, Susan Borowitz
Stars: Will Smith, James Avery, Alfonso Ribeiro

V for Vendetta.summary: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
credits: Director: James McTeigue
Writers: Lilly Wachowski (screenplay) (as The Wachowski Brothers), Lana Wachowski (screenplay) (as The Wachowski Brothers)
Stars: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves

Rick and Morty.summary: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.
credits: Creators: Dan Harmon, Justin Roiland
Stars: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer

Naruto.summary: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.
credits: Creator: Masashi Kishimoto
Stars: Du-Hui Jiang, Junko Takeuchi, Maile Flanagan

MINDHUNTER.summary: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.
credits: Creator: Joe Penhall
Stars: Jonathan Groff, Holt McCallany, Anna Torv

Django Unchained.summary: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
credits: Director: Quentin Tarantino
Writer: Quentin Tarantino
Stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

How I Met Your Mother.summary: A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.
credits: Creators: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas
Stars: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders

Forrest Gump.summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
credits: Director: Robert Zemeckis
Writers: Winston Groom (novel), Eric Roth (screenplay)
Stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

The Discovery.summary: Two years after the afterlife is scientifically proven, a man attempts to help a young woman break away from her dark past.
credits: Director: Charlie McDowell
Writers: Charlie McDowell, Justin Lader
Stars: Robert Redford, Mary Steenburgen, Brian McCarthy

Burning Sands.summary: Deep into Hell Week, a favored pledgee is torn between honoring his code of silence or standing up against the intensifying violence of underground hazing.
credits: Director: Gerard McMurray
Writers: Christine T. Berg (as Christine Berg), Gerard McMurray
Stars: Trevor Jackson, Tosin Cole, DeRon Horton

Ali G Indahouse.summary: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.
credits: Director: Mark Mylod
Writers: Sacha Baron Cohen, Dan Mazer
Stars: Sacha Baron Cohen, Emilio Rivera, Gina La Piana

Brooklyn Nine-Nine.summary: Jake Peralta, an immature, but talented N.Y.P.D. detective in Brooklyn's 99th Precinct, comes into immediate conflict with his new commanding officer, the serious and stern Captain Ray Holt.
credits: Creators: Daniel J. Goor, Michael Schur
Stars: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews

Stranger Things.summary: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
credits: Creators: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer
Stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

Lucifer.summary: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.
credits: Creator: Tom Kapinos
Stars: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro

World War II in Colour.summary: Recounts the events of world War II in color.
credits: Stars: Robert Powell, Erich von Manstein, Mamoru Shigemitsu

Once Upon a Time.summary: A young woman with a troubled past is drawn to a small town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.
credits: Creators: Adam Horowitz, Edward Kitsis
Stars: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jennifer Morrison, Lana Parrilla

The Wandering Earth.summary: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.
credits: Director: Frant Gwo
Writers: Gong Geer, Junce Ye
Stars: Jing Wu, Chuxiao Qu, Guangjie Li

Breaking Bad.summary: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
credits: Creator: Vince Gilligan
Stars: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn

Bill Burr: Paper Tiger.summary: Bill Burr unloads on outrage culture, male feminism, cultural appropriation, robot sex and more in a blistering stand-up special shot in London.
credits: Director: Mike Binder
Writer: Bill Burr
Star: Bill Burr

Explained.summary: A documentary series that looks to explore the big questions of today.
credits: Creators: Joe Posner, Ezra Klein
Stars: Estelle Caswell, Maria Bello, Kristen Bell

The Last Kingdom.summary: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred - born a Saxon but raised by Vikings - seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.
credits: Stars: Alexander Dreymon, Ian Hart, David Dawson

Sherlock.summary: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
credits: Creators: Mark Gatiss, Steven Moffat
Stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs

Love, Death & Robots.summary: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.
credits: Creator: Tim Miller
Stars: Scott Whyte, Nolan North, Matthew Yang King

Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly.summary: 'Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly' traces the Houston rapper's rise to super-stardom, focusing on the months surrounding ASTROWORLD.
credits: Director: White Trash Tyler
Star: Travis Scott

Death Note.summary: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.
credits: Stars: Mamoru Miyano, Brad Swaile, Vincent Tong

Blade Runner 2049.summary: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.
credits: Director: Denis Villeneuve
Writers: Hampton Fancher (screenplay by), Michael Green (screenplay by)
Stars: Harrison Ford, Ryan Gosling, Ana de Armas

Ted 2.summary: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.
credits: Director: Seth MacFarlane
Writers: Seth MacFarlane, Alec Sulkin
Stars: Mark Wahlberg, Seth MacFarlane, Amanda Seyfried

The 100.summary: Set ninety-seven years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends one hundred juvenile delinquents back to Earth, in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.
credits: Creator: Jason Rothenberg
Stars: Eliza Taylor, Bob Morley, Marie Avgeropoulos

Dark.summary: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.
credits: Creators: Baran bo Odar, Jantje Friese
Stars: Karoline Eichhorn, Louis Hofmann, Jördis Triebel

The Matrix.summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
credits: Directors: Lana Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers), Lilly Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers)
Writers: Lilly Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers), Lana Wachowski (as The Wachowski Brothers)
Stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

Shadowhunters: The Mortal Instruments.summary: After her mother disappears, Clary must venture into the dark world of demon hunting, and embrace her new role among the Shadowhunters.
credits: Creator: Ed Decter
Stars: Katherine McNamara, Dominic Sherwood, Alberto Rosende

The Wolf of Wall Street.summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
credits: Director: Martin Scorsese
Writers: Terence Winter (screenplay), Jordan Belfort (book)
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie

Arthdal Chronicles.summary: Arthdal Chronicles depicts the birth of civilization and nations in ancient times. It is a story of mythical heroes, their struggle, unity and love of people living in a virtual land called Arth.
credits: Stars: Joong-Ki Song, Ji-won Kim, Dong-Gun Jang
